get.description: Gets a user definition from token.

401.description: Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

403.description: Returned when the user is not authorized.

429.description: Returned when a user exceeds their subscription's rate limit for requests.

500.description: Returned when the underlying system returns an error.

subject.description: unique identifier of the principal (within issuer context)

issuer.description: optional issuer of the principal identity. Where the issuer is not provided the subject is treated as a free string

email.description: The email for the end-user if available. If email_verified is  available it is preferd. Empty if neither email_verified or email  are provided by the IdP
